label: InstructedTemperature
comment: Temperature settings instructed for storage or movement of goods.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the control of this instructed temperature, such as normal or chilled.
A measure of a maximum value for this sustainability characteristic.
A measure of a minimum value for this sustainability characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: The instructed temperature for delivery applicable to these handling instructions.
The instructed temperature for market delivery applicable to these handling instructions.
The instructed temperature for storage applicable to these handling instructions.
